tasks.test: deno task test-type && deno task test-import && deno task test-dot-method-call && deno task test-dot-constant-access && deno task test-extreme-imports && deno task test-circular-deps && deno task test-circular-simple
tasks.full-macro-test: deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/import/simple2/b.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/import/simple/b.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/import/module2.hql
tasks.test-import: deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/import.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/macro-import-default-module.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/macro-import-name-space.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/dependency-test/macro-a.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/dependency-test2/a.hql
tasks.test-import2: deno run -A ./cli/clean-cache.ts --force && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/import-test/base.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/import-test/direct-js-import.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/import-test/export-lib.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/import-test/export-test.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/import-test/hyphen-test.hql
tasks.test-circular-deps: deno run -A ./cli/clean-cache.ts --force && deno run -A ./cli/transpile.ts ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/extreme-test/circular/a.hql ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/circular-output.js --verbose && deno run -A ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/circular-output.js
tasks.test-circular-simple: deno run -A ./cli/clean-cache.ts --force && deno run -A ./cli/transpile.ts ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/extreme-test/circular/a.hql ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/circular-simple.js --verbose && deno run -A ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/circular-simple.js
tasks.test-extreme-imports: deno run -A ./cli/clean-cache.ts --force && deno run -A ./cli/transpile.ts ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/extreme-test/entry.hql ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/extreme-output.js --verbose && deno run -A ../doc/examples/test-complex-imports/extreme-output.js
tasks.test-function: deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/fx.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/fn.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/fx+loop.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ../doc/examples/fx+fn.hql
